author: Special Correspondent
text:
An estimated 6.62 lakh families in the district would get the free dhoties and saris distributed by the State government ahead of the Pongal festival.

The distribution commenced in the district on Saturday with T.P. Poonachi, Minister for Khadi and Village Industries, handing over the free dhoties and saris to 500 people at a function held at the St.John’s Vestry Anglo Indian Higher Secondary School campus.

Mr.Poonachi said about 1.01 lakh persons getting government assistance under various schemes would be given free dhoties and sarees.

R.Manoharan, Chief Government Whip, K.S.Palanisamy, Collector, and other elected representatives were present.
title: Free dhoties, saris to be distributed ahead of Pongal
